      void updateStaffInfo(int staffId)
      Updates the information of a staff object given the staffId Able to choose which attributes out of all existing attributes of staff to edit After editing any information, the save function will be triggered to save the staffList array into the txt file

      Prints the details of a single staff object given by the staffId

      • addStaff

        public void addStaff()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Function to add staff member into the staffList array list
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when not able to find the staff txt file

      • getStaffList

        public java.util.ArrayList<staff> getStaffList()
        Gets the list of staff in the array
        Returns:
        ArrayList of staff member

      • getStaffListIndexById

        public int getStaffListIndexById(int staffId)
        Gets the index for which the staffId we are looking for in the array list
        Parameters:
        staffId - employeeId
        Returns:
        integer array index that belongs to the staffId, if not found return -1

      • printStaff

        public void printStaff(staff staffMem)
        Prints the details of the staff object
        Parameters:
        staffMem - staff object

      • readStaff

        public manageStaff readStaff()
                      throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                             java.io.IOException
        Function to populate staff list by reading from a txt file
        Returns:
        ArrayList of staff members
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException - when not able to find the txt file to read

      • removeStaff

        public void removeStaff()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Function to remove the staff object. After a staff is deleted, the saveStaffList() function is called to save the updated staffList.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • saveStaffList

        public void saveStaffList()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Function to save current staff list to a txt file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • updateStaffInfo

        public void updateStaffInfo(int staffId)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Updates the information of a staff object given the staffId Able to choose which attributes out of all existing attributes of staff to edit After editing any information, the save function will be triggered to save the staffList array into the txt file
        Parameters:
        staffId - employeeId
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • viewStaffById

        public void viewStaffById(int staffId)
        Prints the details of a single staff object given by the staffId
        Parameters:
        staffId - employeeId

      • viewStaffList

        public void viewStaffList()
        Loops through the staffList array list and calls the printStaff function for each staff object
